title: Her Montana Man
description: Protecting people runs through Jonas Black's blood, and Eliza Jane Sutherland is one woman who needs his strong arms around her.A rugged Montana man, Jonas will guard Eliza from her vile brother-in-law as fiercely as he guards his own heart. But though he can fight her enemies, he can't fight the attraction between them.Soon Jonas is sure they have a future together—only Eliza hides secrets that could change everything….
author: Cheryl St.John
